name: Personality Psychology Premium
detailed_description:
'Personality Psychology Premium' is a huge pack of educational personality tests and games presented in a pleasant / funny way. By these Psychology tests & games you can realize much more about yourself and about your companion (Sexual partner). You can analyze your personality and find out what is on your mind.

USE IT TO:
► Break the ice socially.
► Impress someone by its accurate results.
► Educate and understand yourself better.
► Find more about a close person or have fun with your friends.

FEATURES:
► GPU accelerated full HD graphics when supported.
► Translated into: English, German, Italian, French, Spanish, Greek.
► Over 1000 questions in serious tests.
► Many personality tests for fun.
► Personality stats for up to 3 different users.
► Birthday analysis: Chinese sign, Tree, Color, Past life.

Serious Psychology Tests:
THE INSIDE: Am I happy? Do I like myself? Am I free as a bird? Am I obsessed? Am I stressed? Do I feel healthy? Do I feel guilty? Am I ambitious? Am I adventurous? Am I always right? Am I peaceful? Is my mind stuck? Do I use people? Am I tough?
THE ACTIONS: Am I responsible? Do I take risks? Am I energetic? Am I shy? Am I wise? Am I a thinker? Am I friendly?
THE OTHERS: Am I peaceful? Do I like free will? Do I like change? Am I tolerant? Am I a believer? Am I a racist? Am I a capitalist?
THE SEX: Am I satisfied? Am I conservative? Am I a sex machine? Do I think manly?

Personality Tests for fun:
Paint test, Image test, Dalai Lama test, Story right order, Choose one animal, Choose one color, Question - funeral, Question - order
Interactive Stories: Luna park, Stolen strawberries, Blue bird, The bat, The camel, Sudden rain, The museum, Volcano explosion, The concert, The mountain, Under blue sky, The garbage, Soap bubbles.
Chinese test, Birthday analysis, The color test, Past life analysis, What is your tree.

short_description: 'Personality Psychology Premium' is a huge pack of educational personality tests and games presented in a pleasant / funny way. By these Psychology tests & games you can realize much more about yourself and about your companion.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Greek
reviews:
“Have you ever seen those personality tests that get sent around to your inbox? you know the ones that tell you if you are a great lover or what type of smurf you would be if in fact you could be a smurf...”
9/10 – bbgeeks

“It seems that any magazine you pick up these days will have half a dozen personality tests in it. Wouldn't it be good to do them all in one hit?”
9/10 – softonic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
